Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by its previous owners. Given its quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $150. Considering your potential interest and valuation, I propose a special introductory price of $120 for you. This is an exclusive offer tailored to appreciate your discerning taste and align with your perceived value of the product. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly exceptional. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
